name: Space Race (CodenameWaddles)
description:
This is my first pico-8 game, I had a lot of fun making this, I hope you'll have fun playing it!

Any suggestions are welcome.

  • Made on pico-8
  • Racing game set in space
  • Solo timed mode with high scores
  • Local 1v1 multiplayer mode
  • Six different and unique playable tracks
